title: King James Pure Bible Search-2.0 [KJV]
description:
Free Download @ http://www.dewtronics.com/KingJamesPureBibleSearch/ or <a href=" http://sourceforge.net/projects/purebiblesearch/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://sourceforge.net/projects/purebiblesearch/</a>  New Windows Release Version 2.0.0...For Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, and Windows 8 Desktop 32-bit and 64-bit. Will also run on "Wine" under Linux. Also available for Mac & Linux.                                                                       Changes from Version 1.1 to Version 2.0:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢User Notes Files to support text highlighting, note taking, and passage cross-references
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Much much faster text searching and search results rendering
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Multiple Search Window Support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Search Within capability to let user select specific parts of the Bible to search
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Search Phrase 'OR' operator and Phrase-Exclusions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Details Popup Window Push-Pin to tack the Details Window in place
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢SoundEx support for the auto-completion list to allow the user to enter a word the way they think it sounds and still find it in the list
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved passage entering support for entering a passage reference textually as well as via drop lists
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢User Defined Text color controls and Text Brightness adjustment (useful for people with light sensitivity and dry-eye conditions)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New database format that's about 2/3rds the size of the previous format, but with improved rendering capabilities
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Webster-1828 Dictionary with auto-word locate
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢User selectable copy options to control the format of the copied text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Additions to support foreign language Bible text database files -- note: Foreign language translations will NOT be included in the 2.0 Release due to time constraints. It's planned for the 3.0 Release.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Memory usage optimizations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Rewrite of the main graphical elements to split it into subparts in preparation for mobile release
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Additional User Controls and User Settable Options
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Stealth Installation Mode for use within persecuted countries and organizations
